#type: node
#context: chop
#internal: math
#icon: CHOP/math

= Math =

"""Perform a variety of arithmetic operations on and between channels."""

This CHOP allows you to perform a variety of arithmetic operations on
and between channels.

@parameters

== OP ==

Channel Pre OP:
    A menu of unary operations that are performed on single channels.

Combine Channels:
    A menu of operations performed between the channels of a single input CHOP.

== Mult-Add ==

Pre-Add:
    #channels: /preoff

    First, add value to each new channel.
Multiply:
    #channels: /gain

    Then multiply by this value.
Post-Add:
    #channels: /postoff

    Then add this value.

:include common#common:

@locals

I:
    The current index.
V:
    The current value.
C:
    Current channel index (0 to NC-1).
NC:
    Total number of channels.

@related
    - [Node:chop/logic]
    - [Node:chop/function]
